message:
Hola, el día de mañana 19 de julio 2011 a partir de las 7pm, la gente de Tacit Knowledge hospeda el evento de Destilando Web con la platica de Matt Short: Rats in a maze: Optimizing site traffic patterns with analytics and UX refactoring. A continuación una descripción:Successful web sites often have millions of visits per year, or even
month.  User experience designers and site owners try to encourage
specific behaviors in their visitors; whether these activities range
from buying a product, creating content, participating in social
communities, clicking on ads, to delivering product and service
feedback.  This talk provides an overview of statistical analysis
methods for evaluating how effectively UX design, low error rates, and
speedy page loads encourage desired visitor behavior.  Or discourage
behavior.  Through a series of industry examples and analytic tool
metrics, techniques for navigation, calls-to-action, decision
prodding, breathing, guided activities, and loyalty building will be
measured against the desired visitor behavior.

Les paso la dirección de Tacit Knowledge: En el piso 7 de Av. Agustín Yañez 2895, frente a la Minerva. Este es el mapa: http://maps.google.com/maps/ms?msid=216662786127916519565.0004472629a2dee871827&msa=0
Suena muy interesante el tema y el ponente, alguien sabe mas sobre Tacit Knowledge y Matt Short?
